he took those individuals who made it

if we don't what's the purpose of the

actually they can house with you but
again once you take it that far people
said
oh just a minute here now during a White

now Jim Acosta came out and he basically

one people that enter this country

if you enter this country illegally you

then hit the director with a

when someone chooses to enter this

have regime change actually
deep state was empire-building across

they will stop this any way they

if Trump was going to do something when

the US has satellites above they're
